com.joffrey_bion.compression.burrows_wheeler

Class BWStatsTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joffrey_bion.compression.burrows_wheeler.BWStatsTable

  •  class BWStatsTable
extends java.lang.Object
    A table containing statistics about occurrences of the characters in a Burrows-Wheeler transformed block. It contains information that is used to decode such a block:
    • For each character c, the number of characters in the block that are lexicographically less than c, each character counted as many times as it appears in the transformed block.
    • For each position i in the block, the number of characters that are identical to the character at position i and are located before position i in the transformed block.
    Author:
    Joffrey Bion

      • getNbCharsLessThan

        public int getNbCharsLessThan(char c)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
